text:
Is anyone having issues with email templates?
I have created an email template and send a test email but the images arent showing on the email once recieved. It’s not a matter of “download images” they are showing as broken links

I tried to retest old email templates that were working 100% and now those too are broken. The file in the files havent been moved but even if they had that should be a problem.

When i click on the “view online” link from the broken email i then see all the images. Very odd
Make sure you’re using in-line CSS and not `<style> </style>`
There’s a native AdRoll integration in your portal settings you can use. It listens to the privacy consent banner too.
Does HubSpot allow for one-off 'Apps'? (eg. not listed on the marketplace?)
